description: Enjoy a peaceful solo day exploring the Aasee, Münster's picturesque lake. You can walk around the lake, take in the scenery, and perhaps rent a pedal boat.

locationInfo.description: A beautiful and serene lake located in the heart of Münster. Perfect for a long walk, renting a pedal boat, or simply relaxing by the shore.
safetyTips: Bring plenty of water to stay hydrated.
Wear sunscreen to protect from the sun.
Be mindful of your surroundings, especially near the water.

description: Cycle along the Münster Promenade, a beautiful and extensive route that runs through the city center. It’s ideal for solo cyclists to enjoy the scenic views of the city and parks.

locationInfo.description: The Promenade in Münster is a tree-lined path that encircles the city center, offering a peaceful environment for cycling. This route connects several parks and historic sites.
safetyTips: Ensure your bike is in good working condition before starting.
Keep a safe distance from other cyclists and pedestrians.

activity: Solo Visit to the LWL Museum of Art and Culture
description: Take a solo journey through Münster's LWL Museum of Art and Culture, appreciating the diverse range of art from medieval times to contemporary pieces.

locationInfo.pathNameOrLocationName: LWL Museum of Art and Culture
locationInfo.description: The LWL Museum offers a rich collection of art, culture, and history, allowing visitors to explore various galleries and exhibitions at their own pace.
safetyTips: Take your time to explore each exhibit.
Do not touch the artwork to preserve it.
Check for any special exhibitions or events during your visit.

activity: Solo Walking Tour of Münster's Old Town
description: Wander through the charming streets of Münster's Old Town, discovering historic buildings, hidden courtyards, and landmarks, while enjoying a solo walking experience.

locationInfo.description: Münster's Old Town is full of cobblestone streets, historical architecture, and local landmarks, perfect for a long and leisurely solo walk.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable walking shoes for uneven surfaces.
Stay hydrated, especially during hot days.
Be cautious near busy streets and traffic.

description: Pack a picnic and enjoy a peaceful solo afternoon at Schlossgarten, a beautiful garden near the University of Münster, where you can relax under the sun surrounded by nature.

locationInfo.description: Schlossgarten is a large and scenic garden offering lush greenery, perfect for a peaceful solo picnic under the shade of trees or on the open lawn.
safetyTips: Pack plenty of water and snacks for your picnic.
Choose a shaded spot to avoid direct sunlight.
Take care to leave no trash behind and respect the environment.
